Loren Shevitz
Education August, 2002 University of Chicago Chicago, IL

Bachelor of Arts (Psychology)
Sophomore Honors Award
Residential College graduate (included additional requirements)
Computer Projects Music & Movies: A mock start-up company that sold music & movies and whose 
primary feature was the ability to cross-search based on director, actor, singer, 
content, etc.  Designed with Power Designer.  Used a CRM as the focus.
Loren’s A Cappella SuperStore: Another mock-startup that showcased my ability to 
produce and sell CDs, arrange music, and promote concerts.  Used PHP to connect to a 
Sybase database.
Experience Advanced work in databases, web programming/scripting, Java
Have also programmed in C, C++, Pascal, XML.
Organizations 1996-present
Shircago (jewish a cappella ensemble)
Founder and director of group
Formerly based out of the University of Chicago, group now semi-pro
Accomplishments include 3 CDs (producer of two of them), successful East 
Coast Spring Tour in 2001, inclusion on upcoming Best Of Jewish A Cappella CD.
Maintain website
Handle advertising, book gigs
Compose and arrange music for group using Coda Software’s Finale
Run rehearsals and performances
2001-present
LISTEN UP! a cappella (jewish a cappella ensemble)
Member of semi-pro group that has traveled internationally
Performed in recent Greater Chicago Jewish Arts Folk Festival, which also 
featured Peter Yarrow of Peter, Paul, & Mary
Languages Fluent in Spanish, Hebrew
